name: Eater Upper
description:
This Game Is For The Weekly Game Jam 235
Theme: 
Bandit

Description: 
Try to eat as much food as you can before the chefs get you. Each food has a different amount of fat and once you've stored enough fat you can transform into your Fat Form. In your Fat Form you can roll around and absorb attacks.

Controls: 
- Click to eat (Skinny Form) and roll (Fat Form)
-W,A,S,D or Arrows to move

Note: 
There are still minor bugs that need to be fix in this game.
